questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
options: The Sahara desert is the largest desert in the world.
The Sahara desert are the largest desert in the world.
The Sahara desert am the largest desert in the world.
The Sahara desert be the largest desert in the world.
questions.answer: The Sahara desert is the largest desert in the world.
